name: General
details: Forum for general discussion about traveling. You can find informations about visas, transport, organization, recommendations and etc. Also can find helpful tips for online booking accommodation.
rules: Do not flame or inslut other members.
Do not bypass any filters.
Do not post personally identifiable information.
Do not post a spam.
All forum posts must be written in English.
